commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So, what should we do?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I think this is a good opportunity to find out Setsuna's secrets.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Wait, my secrets?! Don't you guys already know mine...?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: No one cares that you're the student council president. You are who you are.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: We want to know the real secrets about Setsuna Yuki, the school idol!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: What? I don't have any secrets, though.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: We want to know what the normal you is like. You must have secrets about your normal life, right?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: My normal life...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm curious too.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Like whether your expressiveness on stage is a natural talent, or if you do some kind of special training.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yeah. You're interested about that too, right Shizuku?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I am.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Uhh... Wh-What should I do?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Setsuna, why don't you just show them how you are normally?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: But that's... I'm not sure...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: They both want to know, so if you explain things you'll have more people to talk to about it.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Talk? You're right. If can't do it, I'll just stop.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I will tell you my secret!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Why are we all in the club president's room?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Setsuna, here's that DVD I recorded.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thank you.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Umm, *Ahem* Karin, Shizuku, I'm about to show you my favorite DVD. It became as such 2 years ago. It was a cold day...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You're going off again. You don't have to talk so much, just show us the DVD.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: This is the secret to your performance, right?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh, sorry. I was getting off track, wasn't I?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: That's correct. This DVD gives me courage and hope.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Gulp* I won't miss a single second!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: That's good, Shizuku! Don't miss a single frame!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm going to play it now.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Ah... Uhhh... But it...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I know. I understand that logic. You're right.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: If I were you I'd say the same thing. But they have their own reasons for doing that. It's not about logic.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh, every time I see this scene my heart aches. They both have feelings for each other but neither of them can see it.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: They need to talk more, but they're too afraid to talk when they're around each other!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Setsuna, this anime is your favorite DVD?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Wasn't this based off a light novel? I didn't realize they'd made it into an anime.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Just when I thought Setsuna's secrets would be revealed, we get...anime?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Karin, Shizuku! This is not just any anime!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: This anime gives me courage and the will to strive! I mean look at it! Watch this scene!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: After all that was said, she still follows him without question. Any normal person would have left at this point.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: But, she feels that he has some inexplicable reason for all of it, and she trusts that, supporting him the whole time.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It's no small act to build a relationship with so much trust.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You can see in this one scene just how much story isn't shown on screen!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I see...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: But the party was just obliterated because of the main character.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: How can they fight the boss in this shape?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Just watch... There it is!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No matter how much they fight, their bond holds strong and they can't abandon each other!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That seems...like a very convenient plot point.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: But doesn't it feel great seeing how everything turns out for the best, just like you hope it will?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: It is quite relieving to see it turn out the way you expect it to.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I love it so much because there are no surprises and twists. You can just have fun watching it.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Now, let's head into the final scenes!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Sniff* That was so interesting!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Karin, pass the tissues... *Sniff* I'm sorry for calling it just another anime. It was incredible!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I can't believe the main character was so selfish because he was injured in real life.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You can't hate him for wanting to fulfill a dream in the virtual world that he couldn't in the real world.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: The characters helping him recover were his managers in real world.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: They couldn't do anything about his injury in the real world, but they could in the game, so Setsuna stayed by Yuki's side.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We watched the entire series. All 13 episodes in five hours.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I went off again because I thought I could teach you all about my favorite thing! I'm sorry!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: It's fine, Setsuna. I'm actually thankful for it.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I think some of that story can be applied to all of us. Plus, your explanation was great.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes, the passion Setsuna has for it helped me believe. It definitely immersed us into the story.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're talented when it comes to conveying what you love to other people, Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yeah, something about the things you say and do has an irresistible allure to them.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I guess the secret isn't in the technique but just how much Setsuna loves it.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: The power of empathy. I've learned a lot from this.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I hope I can leave the same impression on the people who watch us.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You're not mad?!

commands.speaker: Karin, Shizuku
commands.line: Not at all!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Isn't that great, Setsuna? Now you can have fun talking with everyone about anime.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Y-Yes, I'm so glad.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh, guys! I have a copy of the book this is based off, hidden in the student council room. You can borrow it whenever you want.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You have something like that in the student council room?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I-I know it's not right, but I can't have it at my house. Anime and manga and stuff is banned there.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I've been wanting a copy of this anime for so long...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I see, so that's why we're in the club president's room.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, that's right.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Right, you've suffered a lot.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: But now I understand how you want to protect the things you love! If you ever need it, I can hold onto some stuff for you!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yeah, me too! I can record it for you, so just let me know!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Karin, Shizuku... Thank you so much!
